body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       Fees There are no entrance fees for President's Park or the White House Visitor Center. If you're planning to visit nearby national parks such as Fort Washington Park, Great Falls Park, Greenbelt Park, Harpers Ferry National Historical Park, Manassas National Battlefield Park, or Prince William Forest Park, you may want to purchase a National Parks Pass.
title: President's Park (White House): Fees & Passes
